comment.author: 22081583@N06
comment._content: Before the formal opening of a gorsedd the presiding bard stood on the central stone to deliver his address in Welsh. I wonder if the large stone that is lying on the floor in the centre of the image was meant to represent such a  "Logan Stone" for the start of this gorsedd?

comment.author: 39938860@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Lluniau Corwen pictures, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
